means: 即将发生的，迫在眉睫的

sentence.Network_en: A sense of impending doom came upon all of us.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们所有人都有一种大难临头的感觉。

sentence.Network_en: Against a background of impending famine, heavy fighting took place.
sentence.Network_cn: 即将发生饥荒之时, 严重的战乱爆发了.

sentence.Network_en: The king convoke parliament to cope with the impending danger.
sentence.Network_cn: 国王召开国会以应付迫近眉睫的危险.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... suspension n 中止；停学 impending a 即将发生的 expend v 花费.
英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... impend 迫近 impending 迫近的 indispensable 绝对必要的.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... pending 即将发生的，未决的 impending 行将发生的，逼近的 winding 蜿蜒的，迂回的.
游戏英文词汇 - 豆丁网 ... 复活 Reincarnate 迫近 Impending 刺穿 Impale.

list.abs: 1. impermeableimpended drainage 不良排水rock 岩
impeller pump 叶轮泵impending slough 稠度imperfect frame 不完全框架
帮我翻译一个英文的单词．越详细越好_百度知道 ... heat death 热寂 impending death 垂死; 濒死 mimic death 假死.
末日（Impending Doom）是一款简单的休闲游戏。人类的命运就系于你的手中。

entry.def: An impending event is one that is going to happen very soon.

example.ex: On the morning of the expedition I awoke with a feeling of impending disaster...
example.tran: 出发远征的那个早上,我醒来就有一种灾难即将来临的感觉。

example.ex: He'd spoken to Simon that morning of his impending marriage.
example.tran: 那个早上他已经对西蒙讲过他即将结婚的事了。

means.word_mean: 1. close in time; about to occur;

sentences.sentence: "some people believe the day of judgment is close at hand"

auth_sentence.content: How will we distract the public from impending gloom?
auth_sentence.res_content: How will we distract the public from impending gloom?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How will we distract the public from impending gloom?

auth_sentence.content: There was no previous announcement of his impending return.
auth_sentence.res_content: There was no previous announcement of his impending return.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There was no previous announcement of his impending return.

auth_sentence.content: But his warnings about the impending attacks proved accurate.
auth_sentence.res_content: But his warnings about the impending attacks proved accurate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But his warnings about the impending attacks proved accurate.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =expend,表示"花费,支付"; 2. 最初意思为"称重量而衡量……",引申出花费,支付; 3. =hang,表示"悬挂"

stems_affixes.word_buile: depend[v.[on]取决于,依靠,信赖,相信]+able可以……的→adj.可依赖的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 依靠的,依赖的,从属的;随…而定的
stems_affixes.word_buile: depend[v.[on]取决于,依靠,信赖,相信]+ent……的→adj.依靠的,依赖的,从属的;随…而定的
im进入+pending即将发生的→adj.即将发生的,逼近的
in不+dependent[adj.依靠的,依赖的,从属的;随…而定的]→不依靠[别的人,事或物]
pend悬挂+ing正……的→悬挂之中→即将发生的
per全部+pend悬挂+ic+ular表形容词→全部挂着的→垂直的
append[v.附加,添加,悬挂]+ix表名词→n.附录,附属物;阑尾,盲肠
pend悬挂+ulum东西→挂着[摆动]的东西→钟摆
per全部+pend悬挂+ic+ular表形容词→全部挂着的→垂直的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 花费, 消耗, 用尽
stems_affixes.word_buile: s+pend花费,支付→v.花费, 消耗, 用尽 v.度过, 消磨
ap加强动作+pend悬挂→挂上去→悬挂
de下+pend悬挂→附属于另一物件
sus在……下面+pend挂→挂在下面→悬挂

means.word_mean: 即将发生的;迫在眉睫的

sentences.en: Against a background of impending famine, heavy fighting took place.
sentences.cn: 即将发生饥荒之时，严重的战乱爆发了。

sentences.en: War was impending over the young republic.
sentences.cn: 战争正在逼近这个年轻的共和国。

sentences.en: They received intelligence of an impending invasion.
sentences.cn: 他们收到消息,说侵略就在眼前。

sentences.en: We were well aware of impending disaster.
sentences.cn: 我们清楚地意识到即将来临的灾难。
